title: I Was Naked When I Reached the Other World - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manga   Charismatic Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Determined Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Hunters   Knights   Loli   Male Protagonist   Nudity   Part-Time Job   Perverted Protagonist   Polygamy   S*ave Protagonist   Transported to Another World   Tsundere
author: Okutani Madoka   狐谷まどか
description:
「I was just enjoying my time at the pub, and then—..!」

Yoshida Shuta is just your average 32-year old dropout. Well, that is other than his numerous amount of part-time jobs! From convenience stores to construction and even civil engineering! Yoshida Shuta has accomplished much in his modest thirty-two years.

「Money makes the world go around. I’ll do anything to make it, even if that means taking up every profession in the world!」

Enjoying his night after leaving the pub, he finds himself suddenly transported to a fantasy world…with no clothes! Thought of as suspicious, he’s immediately taken prisoner and forced to work to sustain the lives of a small village.

「Seriously, why am I naked?!」

The story of a single bachelor who climbs his way up the social ladder, starts a harem, and fights monsters—all without clothes!>
